p: The antagonistic activities on SA binding suggest a close relationship between the functions of HA and NA. The role of the viral HA in attachment and infection has been well explored, however, examination of NA has largely focused on its role in the exit of progeny virus from infected cells [ 19]. Interestingly, increasing pieces of evidence strongly support an essential role of NA during virus entry process [ 19, 20]. In this review, we summarize the current state of our understanding of how the interaction of HA and NA affects IAV entry.
